BookFile.Header:
Entry format
Save as Unicode UTF-8 text encoding. Skip section 4 in Part 1, also section 35 which is lists of observations by year.
For volume AJB 06 Index to the Literature of 1904, started 23 April 2020, finished 4 May 2020, proofread
